ProductInfo.Features:
ZMODO ZMD-P4-BARQZ4ZN CCTV Black Night Vision Home Surveillance Security Bullet Camera Kit,Indoor/Outdoor
1/4" Color CMOS Image Sensor, 480 TV Lines Horizontal, 3.6mm Lens, Signal: NTSC
Night Vision Min. Light: 0 Lux (IR On), IR Irradiation Distance: up to 65', Operation Temperature: -25°F~122°F, Weatherproof: Yes
Power: 12V DC, Mount: Wall, Video Connector: BNC, Power Connector: RCA 12V DC, Color: Black
Package Includes: (4) ZMD-CBR-BBB23NM Outdoor IR Security Camera, (4) 60ft CCTV Power + Video Cables for Security Cameras, (1) 12V/1500mA Single Power Supply for Security Cameras, (1) 1-4 Splitter Cable for Security Cameras
